title: Scholarships & Financial Aid
description: Financial support options for postgraduate students

scholarships.name: Post-Graduate Scholarships for Professional Courses SC/ST
scholarships.eligibility: Reserved for SC/ST candidates pursuing professional PG courses
scholarships.coverage: Provided by various state governments and central schemes

scholarships.name: National Scholarship for Postgraduate Studies
scholarships.eligibility: Based on undergraduate marks and category (SC/ST/OBC/etc.)
scholarships.coverage: Annual application, verified by respective institutions

scholarships.name: Indira Gandhi Single Girl Child Scholarship
scholarships.eligibility: For single girl child pursuing PG courses
scholarships.coverage: Conditions on family income and state rules
scholarships.application: Apply through respective state education departments

scholarships.name: GATE Scholarship
scholarships.eligibility: For GATE-qualified candidates pursuing M.Tech/PhD in IITs/NITs
scholarships.coverage: Stipend provided monthly for M.Tech and PhD students

scholarships.name: NET JRF Fellowship
scholarships.eligibility: For NET-qualified Junior Research Fellows pursuing PhD
scholarships.application: Apply through UGC NET application process

scholarships.name: Azim Premji University (APU) Fellowship
scholarships.eligibility: Available for SC/ST on merit and need basis

scholarships.name: Institute Fellowships (up to 1000 INR monthly)
scholarships.eligibility: For students enrolled in select institutions
scholarships.coverage: Varies widely by university and state

scholarships.name: NIELIT Scholarships for SC/ST
scholarships.eligibility: Fee waivers and scholarships for SC/ST candidates

scholarships.name: C-DAC Scholarships for SC/ST
scholarships.eligibility: Fee concessions and fellowships for SC/ST

scholarships.name: PhD Fellowships: NFSC, NFST, NFOBC
scholarships.eligibility: Eligibility based on UGC NET scores and Non-NET criteria
scholarships.coverage: Full-time research fellowships under UGC and ministry schemes
scholarships.application: Apply through UGC and respective ministries

scholarships.name: Babasaheb Bhimrao Ambedkar University (BBAU) SC/ST Scholarships
scholarships.eligibility: Reserved seats and scholarships for SC/ST students

scholarships.name: IITs
scholarships.eligibility: Tuition fee waivers and fellowships for SC/ST
scholarships.coverage: Varies by IIT, frequently updated in academic notices
scholarships.application: Apply through respective IIT admission process

scholarships.name: Selected NITs
scholarships.eligibility: Fee waivers and scholarships for SC/ST candidates
scholarships.application: Apply through respective NIT admission process

scholarships.name: Central Universities (select)
scholarships.eligibility: Scholarships and fee waivers for SC/ST students
scholarships.coverage: Depends on university budget and policies
scholarships.application: Apply through respective university admission process
